English:
Look, you got something to say, you bust right out
with it and you feel better. That's just how you
behave like a good member of society.
Chinese:
有話想說時，比起忍著不說，
不如乾脆講明會比較輕鬆……
這就是能巧妙活在社會上的方法。
Korean:
말하고 싶은 것이 있다면 참는 것보단
차라리 털어놓는 편이 편해져…
그게 훌륭한 회사 생활 요령이야
German:
Schau, wenn du was sagen willst, dann werde es
einfach los. Dann fühlst du dich besser. So
macht man das als guter Bürger.

English:
Yes, the alacrity with which you reported that you
LOST THE DOCUMENTS is admirable. Do it again and
you're fired.
Chinese:
雖然資料遺失的當下能立刻回報是很了不起……
但下次再犯的話……你就給我回家吃自己。
Korean:
확실히 서류를 잃어버린 걸 바로 보고한 것은 잘했지만…
또 저질렀다간 해고다…넌
German:
Ja, du hast bewundernswert eifrig gemeldet, dass
du die DOKUMENTE VERLOREN hast. Mach das noch
mal und du bist gefeuert.

English:
So were you, like, planning to just not bring me
my drink until I died of thirst, or...?
Chinese:
真是的，太慢了吧！
不過就是去買個果汁，到底是要讓我等多久？
Korean:
정말, 늦었잖아!
주스 하나 사러 가는데 언제까지 기다리게 할 생각이야?
German:
Wolltest du warten, bis ich verdurste, bevor du
mir etwas zu trinken bringst, oder ...?

English:
I-I-I...look, I'm sorry! The place was just so, so
crowded for some reason...
Chinese: 不、不知道為什麼，店裡人很多……
German:
I-I-Ich ... Es tut mir leid! Hier war es nur
irgendwie so voll ...

English:
Um, yeah, have you never been to a store that's
got a Chimelin star before? Oh, look, you forgot
the straw too! Great!
Chinese:
那是當然的啊！　那是修米拉介紹過的名店喔！
啊，你還忘了拿吸管！
Korean:
당연하잖아! 슐미랭에 소개된 인기 가게니까!
앗, 거기다가 빨대 깜박했잖아!
German:
Äh, ja, warst du noch nie in einem Laden mit
Chimelin-Stern? Ach, und den Strohhalm hast du
auch vergessen, na prächtig!

English: Gah! I'll go, I'll go get one...
Chinese: 對、對不起，我馬上回去拿……

English: You better bring two! ...So you and I can share.
Chinese:
要記得拿兩根吸管喔！
……我想跟你一起喝。
Korean:
제대로 2개 받아오란 말이야!
…너하고 같이 마시고 싶으니까
German:
Bring besser zwei mit! ... Damit wir es uns
teilen können.

English:
The Shinjuku underground? It's just down those
stairs.
Chinese:
新宿的地下？
啊，只要下了這個樓梯就能到了……
Korean: 신주쿠의 지하? 아아, 거기 계단을 내려가면 갈 수 있는데…
German:
Die U-Bahnstation für Shinjuku?
Die ist gleich die Treppe da runter.

English:
I joined a foodie forum on EDEN and learned the
tastiest-looking recipe! I'm going to give it a
try tonight.
Chinese:
在EDEN喜歡料理人的討論區裡
得到了美味的食譜，今晚就來試試看吧。
Korean:
EDEN에서 요리를 좋아하는 사람들의 포럼에 들어갔어.
맛있는 레시피를 배웠으니까, 오늘 밤에 시험해봐야지
German:
Ich bin einem Forum für Gourmets in EDEN
beigetreten und habe ein Rezept gefunden, das
köstlich aussieht! Ich probiere es heute Abend.

English:
Sounds like we better hit the grocery store on the
way home!
Chinese: 那在回家的路上順便去買食材吧。
German:
Wir sollten auf dem Heimweg wohl lieber im
Supermarkt vorbeischauen!
